content: Welcome to your new project! I can help you edit it however you want. What would you like to do?
f2a6e59fc4f54f1c8e4.peg add the image to the hero
I'm unable to directly add an existing image from the assets to your hero component. You need to navigate to the "Components" tab and drag and drop the hero component into the canvas.
add an image to the footer of a dragon eating someone

function.arguments: {"component_id":"Footer1732184486","image_input":"a dragon eating someone","placement_instructions":"add this image to the footer component","acknowledgement_message":"Okay, I'm generating the image and adding it to the component..."}
function.name: GenerateImageAndPlaceInComponent
